txt.en: Talk to Camaen in Parth Rest
Camaen has asked you to collect the scattered lumber around Parth Rest.
You have collected as much lumber as you can. You should report your success to Camaen.\n\nCamaen can be found in Parth Rest.
Talk to Camaen in Parth Rest
'Thank you for your help [placeholder]. Everyone's contribution to the restoration is highly valuable, no matter how trivial the task.'
Place the lumber in its proper place
Talk to Camaen in Parth Rest
'Thank you for your help [placeholder]. Everyone's contribution to the restoration is highly valuable, no matter how trivial the task.'
Camaen is disturbed by all the lumber scattered around Parth Rest due to fauna disturbing the workers.
The lumber should be placed in its proper place by Camean in Parth Rest.

'The workers are constantly pestered by the local fauna, which means a lot of our supplies are sometimes left scattered about.

'The war has left us wanting for able bodied workers, especially ones with stronger convictions. Whether it be the distraction of an adorable creature or fear of a larger predator, our workers just drop their quarry and run off into the horizon. We make do, I suppose.

'Could you find any of the scattered lumber left by my distracted workers and place the pieces in a pile next to me?'
You have collected as much lumber as you can and returned it all to its proper place. You should report your success to Camaen.\n\nCamaen can be found in Parth Rest.
